Web_Speech_API.summary:
The Web Speech API enables you to incorporate voice data into web apps.
The Web Speech API has two parts: SpeechSynthesis (Text-to-Speech), and SpeechRecognition (Asynchronous Speech Recognition.)

Web_Speech_APIUsing_the_Web_Speech_API.summary: The Web Speech API provides two distinct areas of functionality — speech recognition and speech synthesis (also known as text to speech, or TTS) — which open up interesting possibilities for accessibility and control. This article provides an introduction to both the areas, along with demos.
